channel.title: How to change client background 508
channel.description: this is what the log in screen looks like. [IMG]http://i966.photobucket.com/albums/ae143/edgevillepk/ScreenHunter_01Jul270143.gif[/img] I want to change the picture, get rid of the Runescape logo, and remove the flames. Or at least change the picture back to the regular 508 login screen.( I did not make these changes in the first place. I downloaded the client and it was like that. I need to keep this client though because it has all the custom items i need.)
